scripts.create-reports: npm run clean-reports && npx cypress run --spec "C:\Users\QA-lead\Downloads\amelio_cypress_automation\cypress\e2e\amelio\Survey_languages" --reporter mochawesome && npx mochawesome-merge mochawesome-report/*.json > cypress/report/output.json && npx marge cypress/report/output.json --reportDir cypress/report --inline
